verses.verse: Brethren, <WG80> my heart's desire <WG2107> and my prayer <WG1162> to God <WG2316> for them is for [their] salvation. <WG4991>
For I bear <WG3140> them witness <WG3140> that they have <WG2192> a zeal <WG2205> for God, <WG2316> but not in accordance <WG2596> with knowledge. <WG1922>

For not knowing <WG50> about God <WG2316>'s righteousness, <WG1343> and seeking <WG2212> to establish <WG2476> their own, <WG2398> they did not subject <WG5293> themselves to the righteousness <WG1343> of God.
For Christ <WG5547> is the end <WG5056> of the law <WG3551> for righteousness <WG1343> to everyone <WG3956> who believes. <WG4100>
For Moses <WG3475> writes <WG1125> that the man <WG444> who practices <WG4160> the righteousness <WG1343> which is based <WG1537> on law <WG3551> shall live <WG2198> by that righteousness. <WG846>

But the righteousness <WG1343> based <WG1537> on faith <WG4102> speaks <WG3004> thus, <WG3779> "Do not say <WG3004> in your heart, <WG2588> 'Who <WG5101> will ascend <WG305> into heaven <WG3772>?' (that is, to bring <WG2609> Christ <WG5547> down <WG2609>),
or <WG2228> 'Who <WG5101> will descend <WG2597> into the abyss <WG12>?' (that is, to bring <WG321> Christ <WG5547> up from the dead <WG3498>). "

But what <WG5101> does it say <WG3004>? "The word <WG4487> is near <WG1451> you, in your mouth <WG4750> and in your heart <WG2588>" â€“ that is, the word <WG4487> of faith <WG4102> which <WG3739> we are preaching, <WG2784>

that if <WG1437> you confess <WG3670> with your mouth <WG4750> Jesus <WG2424> [as] Lord, <WG2962> and believe <WG4100> in your heart <WG2588> that God <WG2316> raised <WG1453> Him from the dead, <WG3498> you shall be saved; <WG4982>
for with the heart <WG2588> man believes, <WG4100> resulting <WG1519> in righteousness, <WG1343> and with the mouth <WG4750> he confesses, <WG3670> resulting <WG1519> in salvation. <WG4991>
For the Scripture <WG1124> says, <WG3004> "Whoever <WG3956> believes <WG4100> in Him will not be disappointed. <WG2617>"

For there is no <WG3756> distinction <WG1293> between Jew <WG2453> and Greek; <WG1672> for the same <WG846> [Lord <WG2962>] is Lord of all, <WG3956> abounding <WG4147> in riches <WG4147> for all <WG3956> who call <WG1941> upon Him;
for "Whoever <WG3956> will call <WG1941> upon the name <WG3686> of the Lord <WG2962> will be saved. <WG4982>"

How <WG4459> then <WG3767> shall they call <WG1941> upon Him in whom <WG3739> they have not believed <WG4100>? And how <WG4459> shall they believe <WG4100> in Him whom <WG3739> they have not heard <WG191>? And how <WG4459> shall they hear <WG191> without <WG5565> a preacher <WG2784>?

And how <WG4459> shall they preach <WG2784> unless <WG1437> <WG3361> they are sent <WG649>? Just <WG2509> as it is written, <WG1125> "How <WG5613> beautiful <WG5611> are the feet <WG4228> of those <WG3588> who bring <WG2097> glad <WG2097> tidings <WG2097> of good <WG18> things! <WG18>"

However, <WG235> they did not all <WG3956> heed <WG5219> the glad <WG2098> tidings; <WG2098> for Isaiah <WG2268> says, <WG3004> "Lord, <WG2962> who <WG5101> has believed <WG4100> our report <WG189>? "
So <WG686> faith <WG4102> [comes] from hearing, <WG189> and hearing <WG189> by the word <WG4487> of Christ. <WG5547>

But I say, <WG3004> surely <WG3361> they have never <WG3361> <WG3756> heard, <WG191> have they? Indeed <WG3304> they have; "Their voice <WG5353> has gone <WG1831> out into all <WG3956> the earth, <WG1093> And their words <WG4487> to the ends <WG4009> of the world. <WG3625>"

But I say, <WG3004> surely <WG3361> Israel <WG2474> did not know, <WG1097> did they? At the first <WG4413> Moses <WG3475> says, <WG3004> "I will make <WG3863> you jealous <WG3863> by that which is not a nation, <WG1484> By a nation <WG1484> without <WG801> understanding <WG801> will I anger <WG3949> you."

And Isaiah <WG2268> is very <WG662> bold <WG662> and says, <WG3004> "I was found <WG2147> by those <WG3588> who sought <WG2212> Me not, I became <WG1096> manifest <WG1717> to those <WG3588> who did not ask <WG1905> for Me."
But as for Israel <WG2474> He says, <WG3004> "All <WG3650> the day <WG2250> long I have stretched <WG1600> out My hands <WG5495> to a disobedient <WG544> and obstinate <WG483> people. <WG2992>"
